channel.title: Every time i open mopar it loses connection and logs out

item.title: Every time i open mopar it loses connection and logs out
item.dc:creator: @Lanthus20 Lanthus20
item.description:
@Lanthus20 wrote:

thats something i didnt think of, hes conveniently offline so i’ll answer asuming he has used silabs

if you’ve used silab items, you’ll need the silab client, which can be found at client.silabsoft.com

if you use mopar with new models in your inventory/wearing you’ll automatically disconnect

Read full topic

item.title: Every time i open mopar it loses connection and logs out
item.dc:creator: @pwnage2 pwnage2
item.description:
@pwnage2 wrote:

i created my new server and played on it for a few minutes then it lost connection. now every time i log in i click to move and it wont. then in a few seconds it says lost connection and i cant get back in

Read full topic
item.source: Every time i open mopar it loses connection and logs out

item.title: Every time i open mopar it loses connection and logs out
item.dc:creator: @Lanthus20 Lanthus20
item.description:
@Lanthus20 wrote:

when does this occur? while signing into a server? if so your just signing into the wrong servers, its just either a) your using the wrong port (most servers use 43594) or your trying to get onto laggy servers like something other then RS2DV

Read full topic
